articles.author: Yoosef K
articles.title: United Spirits plans its first dividend in a decade after wiping out the piled-up losses - CNBCTV18
articles.description: United Spirits resumed dividend distribution and declared an interim dividend of ₹4 per share for the financial year 2024. The company has not declared any dividend from the financial year 2013-14 onwards.
